t: Amazon Flooring Finder
s: Flooring Finder is intended to make your shopping experience more inspirational and easier to navigate, bringing all of the flooring selection, product information, and sample availability right to you all in one place.

t: RiteRug Flooring | Carpet, Tile, Hardwood, Vinyl, Laminate Flooring
s: RiteRug Flooring is your trusted expert for installed carpet, hardwood, laminate, tile and luxury vinyl flooring. Our huge in-stock inventory is available for next day installation. Schedule an in-home shopping appointment to see samples in your space, shop online or visit a store today.

t: RiteRug Flooring History Family Owned Since 1934
s: RiteRug Flooring brand history including original newspaper advertisements and photos from the 1950's thru 1980's. Part of Columbus, ohio history since 1934.

t: Carpet Store – RiteRug Flooring
s: August 30, 2021 - RiteRug Flooring's vast collection of carpet includes hundreds of styles, colors and textures. Schedule an in-home showing, visit a store, or shop online.

t: Oh My Rhino – RiteRug Flooring
s: Oh My is a gorgeous wood-look laminate collection with a natural rustic feel. It is water resistant, making it child and pet friendly. 7.5 in. x 50.7 in. planks 12 mm total thickness 18.42 sq ft per box Water resistant, kid and pet friendly Natural wood-look RiteRug Exclusive Made in the USA

t: About RiteRug Flooring
s: January 31, 2025 - RiteRug Flooring is a prominent flooring and home improvement retailer with headquarters in Columbus, Ohio. Established in 1934, the company has grown from a small local business into the second-largest flooring retailer in the United States, all while maintaining its family-owned legacy.

t: Local Carpet and Flooring Stores – RiteRug Flooring
s: Find a RiteRug Flooring retail store, showroom or outlet store near your location or schedule a convenient in-home shopping appointment with a Flooring Expert.

t: Why You Should Choose RiteRug – RiteRug Flooring
s: November 25, 2020 - Since 1934 RiteRug Flooring has offered a wide selection of in-stock carpet, luxury vinyl, hardwood, laminate and tile flooring with installation at competitive prices byknowledgeable Flooring Experts.

t: Intrinsic Compelling Carpet | RiteRug Flooring
s: The Intrinsic carpet collection has gorgeous organic tones lending a subtle texture and iridescence. Crafted out of SureSoftSD, it also carries the added protection of Microban which is designed to prevent the growth of stain and odor-causing bacteria, mold and mildew.

t: Noble Hall Esquire Hardwood | RiteRug Flooring
s: The Noble Hall engineered hardwood collection features long, wide planks and the wire-brushed surface lends a tone of strength and heritage to a space. The unique modern color tones, including hard-to-find light, cool blonde woods, work perfectly with any decorating style.

t: RiteRug Flooring Shipping and Return Policies.
s: November 26, 2020 - Online orders placed on the RiteRug Flooring website, www.riterug.com, can be shipped to all 48 contiguous states, except for California. They can be shipped to residential and commercial locations. The delivery method is dependent upon the size of the order and the delivery location.
